import useInput from "../../hooks/use-input"; import styles from './UseForm.module.css'; const UserForm = (props) => { const { inputValue: nameInput, isInputValue: isNameInputInvalid, inputChangeHandler: nameInputHandler, inputBlurHandler: nameBlurHandler, } = useInput(value => value.trim() !== '') let isFormValid; const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); isFormValid = !isNameInputInvalid; if (!isFormValid) { return } const formData = { name: nameInput, } console.log("Form is Valid "); console.log(formData) } return
